channel.title: Zombie on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Zombie on Game6r

item.title: Zombie Mission 4
item.description: In this game, you will travel through various locations and destroy attacking zombies from available firearms. In the future, it will be possible to improve it or change it to a more powerful one. You can only get to the next level when you have dealt with all the enemies in the current location. Only in this case will the doors of the passage open.
